title: Hour 1 - Tom Curran (05-01-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Tom Curran (05-01-20)
description:
Dan Patrick talks about Andy Dalton's legacy and when major American sports will realistically return. Dan is joined by Tom Curran to discuss the Patriots' mindset heading into a season without Tom Brady!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
